JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are searching for a Landscape Architect or similar to plan playgrounds and outdoor fitness areas for our international markets in South America, Eastern Europe and the Arabic world. You will be part of the international sales team, which is lead from Odense, but has employees in Spain, Dubai, Chile, etc.

Together with our customers and agents, the team designs and visualizes large playgrounds and outdoor fitness areas for many different purposes such as public parks, housing, schools, preschools, zoos, etc.

Your close colleagues will be two visualizers, 7 salespeople and coordinators and our colleagues at the agencies, and you will be a part of our community of 15 landscape architects in Australia, Singapore, China over Europe and to the US. 

Key role and responsibilities

Your role and responsibilities will include to:

  • Be key player in the development of outdoor play and fitness solutions
  • Develop the theme of the activity area, choosing the products, or having the product tailormade to the site and theme, planning the site, including resting areas, quiet areas, etc.
  • Coordinate with our visualizers how the visuals are to be made to support the theme and solution
  • Develop a plan for the physical presentation and the actual live presentation of our plan

From time to time, the activity areas include to make completely unique products, and, in these situations, you will be part of the work of our central product design studio

Additionally, coordinate through our local teams with landscape architects, architects, consultants etc. in key markets in order to understand and deliver to local masterplans, and support these with relevant themes, help ease specifications for local tenders, and stimulate play- and outdoor fitness solutions, where KOMPAN is a potential supplier.

Your background and contribution

As a person you contribute with: 

  • An educational background as an architect, landscape architect, designer, scenographer, or similar
  • A few of year of experience can be an advantage, but with the right personality this is not a must
  • A great enthusiasm for planning outdoor activity areas
  • Excellent command of CAD software (AutoCAD command is needed, alternatively Rhino, Revitt, etc. and then we will teach you AutoCAD)
  • A colleague who gets energy from driving and contributing with your part of the project and who can work as a part of a team of different skillsets
  • Self-propelled and liking a fast pace to create the customers’ desire
  • Fluent in English (Danish is not a must)

KOMPAN

Our mission is to help create happier and healthier communities by designing, manufacturing, and constructing outdoor playgrounds and fitness areas that WOW users to come play, motivate them to stay and come back, and develop children’s and adult’s health and life-skills. Our solutions are made for all ages and all abilities. We have done so since 1970, and today - around the world - KOMPAN, every month, builds 1000 new playgrounds and outdoor fitness areas. We do so from subsidiaries in 30 countries and are an additionally 60 countries via our agencies. The workplace of this role is in Odense, near the motorway. Meet the colleagues in KOMPAN https://youtu.be/rM6Y9tJJjrs  

Our KOMPAN colleagues were not developed overnight. We provide training and mentoring to get your head around this role. Our culture is focused on achieving business goals through teamwork and are determined to be the industry leader in all aspects. Therefore, we are looking for talent who will go on the journey with us. 

Kompan is an equal opportunity employer and encourage all to apply. Please submit a short cover letter of application along with a condensed CV as well as a portfolio of carefully selected concise and relevant work.  For questions, please contact Thomas Bøtker Mortensen, Group Marketing Director on ThoMor@Kompan.com
